    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        @OnWebSocketConnect
public void onConnect(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session)
        Fired when the websocket from the client connects. Add it to the ConnectionManager's list of connections.
        Parameters:
        session - The session with the web client

      • onMessage

        @OnWebSocketMessage
public void onMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Fired when the client sends a message. Tell the connection manager to repeat the message to all other clients, but do not loop it back to the sender.
        Parameters:
        message - the (text) message sent from the client to the server, typicall in JSON format

      • onBinaryMessage

        @OnWebSocketMessage
public void onBinaryMessage(byte[] buf,
                                                int offset,
                                                int length)
        Fired when a client sends a binary message.
        Parameters:
        buf - binary data
        offset - offset into binary data (see interface)
        length - length of binary data (see interface)

      • onClose

        @OnWebSocketClose
public void onClose(int statusCode,
                                      java.lang.String reason)
        Fired when the web socket closes. The client informs us, and we remove the client from the list of active clients in ConnectionManager
        Parameters:
        statusCode - reason for closure
        reason - string reason for closure

      • sendToClient

        public void sendToClient(java.lang.String message)
        Sends data in string format to the client. This is typically in JSON format. This is usually called by the ConnectionManager.
        Specified by:
        sendToClient in interface DISEndpoint
        Parameters:
        message - data to be sent

      • sendBinaryToClient

        public void sendBinaryToClient(byte[] buf)
        Sends data in binary format to the client. The end client is typically another web page. This is called typically from ConnectionManager.
        Specified by:
        sendBinaryToClient in interface DISEndpoint
        Parameters:
        buf - typically a IEEE-1278.1 DIS packet

      • getMessagesSentSummaryStatistics

        public java.util.IntSummaryStatistics getMessagesSentSummaryStatistics()
        Get the summary statistics object for this connection for the number of messages (binary and json) sent. IntSummaryStatistics is a JDK8 class.
        Specified by:
        getMessagesSentSummaryStatistics in interface DISEndpoint
        Returns:
        IntSummaryStatistics summary stats for messages sent

      • getMessagesReceivedSummaryStatistics

        public java.util.IntSummaryStatistics getMessagesReceivedSummaryStatistics()
        Get the summary statistics object for this connection for the number of binary messages (binary and json) received. IntSummaryStatistics is a JDK8 class.
        Specified by:
        getMessagesReceivedSummaryStatistics in interface DISEndpoint
        Returns:
        IntSummaryStatistics summary stats for messages sent
